body.gatha1: Yoyo ve uppatitaṃ vineti kodhaṃ, visaṭaṃ sappavisaṃva osadhehiosadhebhi ;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃjiṇṇamiva tacaṃjiṇṇamiva tacaṃjiṇṇamiva tacaṃjiṇṇamiva tacaṃjiṇṇamivā tacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo rāgamudacchidā asesaṃ, bhisapupphaṃva saroruhaṃsareruhaṃ vigayha;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ, purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo taṇhamudacchidā asesaṃ, saritaṃ sīghasaraṃ visosayitvā;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo mānamudabbadhī asesaṃ, naḷasetuṃva sudubbalaṃ mahogho;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nājjhagamā bhavesu sāraṃ, vicinaṃ pupphamivapupphamiva udumbaresu;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassantarato na santi kopā, itibhavābhavatañcaitibbhavābhavatañca vītivatto;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassa vitakkā vidhūpitā, ajjhattaṃ suvikappitā asesā;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ accagamā imaṃ papañcaṃ;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti ñatvāutvāutvāutvā loke;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītalobho;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītarāgo;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītadoso;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nāccasārī na paccasārī, sabbaṃ vitathamidanti vītamoho;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassānusayā na santi keci, mūlā ca akusalā samūhatāse;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassa darathajā na santi keci, oraṃ āgamanāya paccayāse;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yassa vanathajā na santi keci, vinibandhāya bhavāya hetukappā;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo nīvaraṇe pahāya pañca, anigho tiṇṇakathaṃkatho visallo;
body.gathalast: So bhikkhu jahāti orapāraṃ, urago jiṇṇamivattacaṃ purāṇaṃ.
Channā kuṭi āhito gini, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Vivaṭā kuṭi nibbuto gini, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Vuṭṭhimpi saheyyumāgataṃ, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Attho bhisiyā na vijjati, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Tassā na suṇāmi kiñci pāpaṃ, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Pāpaṃ pana me na vijjati, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Tesaṃ na suṇāmi kiñci pāpaṃ, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Attho bhatiyā na vijjati, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Usabhopi gavampatīdha atthi, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Usabhopi gavampatīdha natthi, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Na hi sakkhinti dhenupāpi chettuṃchetuṃ , atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Nāhaṃ punupessaṃpuna upessaṃpuna upessaṃpuna upessaṃpuna upessaṃpunupeyya gabbhaseyyaṃ, atha ce patthayasī pavassa deva’’.
Sutvā devassa vassato, imamatthaṃ dhaniyo abhāsatha.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Lābhā vata no anappakā, ye mayaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasāma;
body.gathalast: Saraṇaṃ taṃ upema cakkhuma, satthā no hohi tuvaṃ mahāmuni.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gopī ca ahañca assavā, brahmacariyaṃbrahmacariya sugate carāmase;
body.gathalast: Jātimaraṇassa pāragūpāragāpāragāpāragāpāragā , dukkhassantakarā bhavāmase’’.
Upadhī hi narassa nandanā, na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhi’’.
Upadhī hi narassa socanā, na hi so socati yo nirūpadhī’’ti.
body.gatha1: Sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ, aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ;
body.gathalast: Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāyaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Saṃsaggajātassa bhavanti snehā, snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahoti;
body.gathalast: Ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Mitte suhajje anukampamāno, hāpeti atthaṃ paṭibaddhacitto;
body.gathalast: Etaṃ bhayaṃ santhavesandhave pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Vaṃso visālova yathā visatto, puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā;
body.gathalast: Vaṃsakkaḷīrovavaṃsakaḷīrovavaṃsākaḷīrovavaṃsākaḷīrovavaṃsākaḷīrovavaṃsekaḷīrova sajjamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Migo araññamhi yathā abaddhoabandhoabandho , yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāya;
body.gathalast: Viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Āmantanā hoti sahāyamajjhe, vāse ṭhāne gamane cārikāya;
body.gathalast: Anabhijjhitaṃ seritaṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Khiḍḍā ratī hoti sahāyamajjhe, puttesu ca vipulaṃ hoti pemaṃ;
body.gathalast: Piyavippayogaṃ vijigucchamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hoti, santussamāno itarītarena;
body.gathalast: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Dussaṅgahā pabbajitāpi eke, atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā;
body.gathalast: Appossukko paraputtesu hutvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Chetvāna vīro gihibandhanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Sace labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayāni, careyya tenattamano satīmā.
body.gatha1: No ce labhetha nipakaṃ sahāyaṃ, saddhiṃ caraṃ sādhuvihāridhīraṃ;
body.gathalast: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāya, eko care mātaṅgaraññeva nāgo.
body.gatha1: Addhā pasaṃsāma sahāyasampadaṃ, seṭṭhā samā sevitabbā sahāyā;
body.gathalast: Ete aladdhā anavajjabhojī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Saṅghaṭṭamānāni duve bhujasmiṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Evaṃ dutiyenadutiyena sahā mamassa, vācābhilāpo abhisajjanā vā;
body.gathalast: Etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Kāmā hi citrā madhurā manoramā, virūparūpena mathenti cittaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ādīnavaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Ītī ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca, rogo ca sallañca bhayañca metaṃ;
body.gathalast: Etaṃ bhayaṃ kāmaguṇesu disvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Sītañca uṇhañca khudaṃ pipāsaṃ, vātātape ḍaṃsasarīsapeḍaṃsasiriṃsapeḍaṃsasiriṃsapeḍaṃsasiriṃsapeḍaṃsasiriṃsape ca;
body.gathalast: Sabbānipetāni abhisambhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Nāgova yūthāni vivajjayitvā, sañjātakhandho padumī uḷāro;
body.gathalast: Yathābhirantaṃ viharaṃvihareviharevihare araññe, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Aṭṭhānataṃ saṅgaṇikāratassa, yaṃ phassayephussaye sāmayikaṃ vimuttiṃ;
body.gathalast: Ādiccabandhussa vaco nisamma, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Uppannañāṇomhi anaññaneyyo, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Nirāsayonirāsāso sabbaloke bhavitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha, anatthadassiṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sayaṃ na seve pasutaṃ pamattaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Bahussutaṃ dhammadharaṃ bhajetha, mittaṃ uḷāraṃ paṭibhānavantaṃ;
body.gathalast: Aññāya atthāni vineyya kaṅkhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ kāmasukhañca loke, analaṅkaritvā anapekkhamāno;
body.gathalast: Vibhūsanaṭṭhānā virato saccavādī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Puttañca dāraṃ pitarañca mātaraṃ, dhanāni dhaññāni ca bandhavānibandhavāni ca ;
body.gathalast: Hitvāna kāmāni yathodhikāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Saṅgo eso parittamettha sokhyaṃ, appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyo;
body.gathalast: Gaḷo eso iti ñatvā mutīmāmatīmāmatīmā , eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Aggīva daḍḍhaṃ anivattamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Okkhittacakkhū na ca pādalolo, guttindriyo rakkhitamānasāno;
body.gathalast: Anavassuto apariḍayhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Kāsāyavattho abhinikkhamitvā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Rasesu gedhaṃ akaraṃ alolo, anaññaposī sapadānacārī;
body.gathalast: Kule kule appaṭibaddhacittoappaṭibandhacitto , eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Pahāya pañcāvaraṇāni cetaso, upakkilese byapanujja sabbe;
body.gathalast: Anissito chetvachetvāchetvāchetvā sinehadosaṃsnehadosaṃ , eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Vipiṭṭhikatvāna sukhaṃ dukhañca, pubbeva ca somanassadomanassaṃ;
body.gathalast: Laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Daḷhanikkamo thāmabalūpapanno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesu, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
Saṅkhātadhammo niyato padhānavā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Sīhova saddesu asantasanto, vātova jālamhi asajjamāno;
body.gathalast: Padumaṃva toyena alippamānoalimpamānoalimpamānoalimpamāno , eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Sīho yathā dāṭhabalī pasayha, rājā migānaṃ abhibhuyya cārī;
body.gathalast: Sevetha pantāni senāsanāni, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Mettaṃ upekkhaṃ karuṇaṃ vimuttiṃ, āsevamāno muditañca kāle;
body.gathalast: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamāno, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Rāgañca dosañca pahāya mohaṃ, sandālayitvāna saṃyojanāni;
body.gathalast: Asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhi, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.gatha1: Bhajanti sevanti ca kāraṇatthā, nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittā;
body.gathalast: Attaṭṭhapaññā asucī manussā, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadhesu viharati dakkhiṇāgirismiṃdakkhiṇagirismiṃ ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme. Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa pañcamattāni naṅgalasatāni payuttāni honti vappakāle. Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa kammanto tenupasaṅkami. Tena kho pana samayena kasibhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa parivesanā vattati. Atha kho bhagavā yena parivesanā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.

Addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ. Disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘ahaṃ kho, samaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmi. Tvampi, samaṇa, kasassu ca vapassu ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjassū’’ti.

‘‘Ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī’’ti. ‘‘Na kho pana mayaṃna kho pana samaṇa passāma bhoto gotamassa yugaṃ vā naṅgalaṃ vā phālaṃ vā pācanaṃ vā balibaddebalivaddebalivaddebalībadde vā. Atha ca pana bhavaṃ gotamo evamāha – ‘ahampi kho, brāhmaṇa, kasāmi ca vapāmi ca; kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjāmī’’’ti.
Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kassako paṭijānāsi, na ca passāma te kasiṃ;
body.gathalast: Kasiṃ no pucchito brūhi, yathā jānemu te kasiṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhi, paññā me yuganaṅgalaṃ;
body.gathalast: Hirī īsā mano yottaṃ, sati me phālapācanaṃ.
Saccaṃ karomi niddānaṃ, soraccaṃ me pamocanaṃ.
Gacchati anivattantaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati.
Etaṃ kasiṃ kasitvāna, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti.
body.paragraph: Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā pāyasaṃpāyāsaṃ vaḍḍhetvā bhagavato upanāmesi – ‘‘bhuñjatu bhavaṃ gotamo pāyasaṃ. Kassako bhavaṃ; yaṃ hi bhavaṃ gotamo amatapphalaṃamatapphalampi kasiṃ kasatī’’ti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gāthābhigītaṃ me abhojaneyyaṃ, sampassataṃ brāhmaṇa nesa dhammo;
body.gathalast: Gāthābhigītaṃ panudanti buddhā, dhamme satī brāhmaṇa vuttiresā.
Annena pānena upaṭṭhahassu, khettaṃ hi taṃ puññapekkhassa hotī’’ti.
body.paragraph: ‘‘Atha kassa cāhaṃ, bho gotama, imaṃ pāyasaṃ dammī’’ti? ‘‘Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, brāhmaṇa, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya, yassa so pāyaso bhutto sammā pariṇāmaṃ gaccheyya, aññatra tathāgatassa vā tathāgatasāvakassa vā. Tena hi tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, taṃ pāyasaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍehi appāṇake vā udake opilāpehī’’ti.

Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo taṃ pāyasaṃ appāṇake udake opilāpesi. Atha kho so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyatisandhūmāyati sampadhūmāyati . Seyyathāpi nāma phālo divasaṃ santattodivasasantattodivasasantattodivasasantattodivasasantatto udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati; evameva so pāyaso udake pakkhitto cicciṭāyati ciṭiciṭāyati sandhūpāyati sampadhūpāyati.

Atha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo saṃviggo lomahaṭṭhajāto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ , bho gotama! Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa vā maggaṃ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṃ dhāreyya, cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantītidakkhintītidakkhintītidakkhintītidakkhintīti ; evamevaṃ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito. Esāhaṃ bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca, labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada’’nti.

Alattha kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ. Acirūpasampanno kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva – yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ – brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi. ‘‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’’ti abbhaññāsi. Aññataro caaññataro ca khoaññataro ca khoaññataro khoaññataro khoaññataro kho panāyasmā bhāradvājo arahataṃ ahosīti.
body.gathalast: Dvipaduttamaṃdipaduttamaṃdipaduttamaṃdipaduttamaṃdipaduttamaṃ sārathīnaṃ pavaraṃ, kati loke samaṇā tadiṅgha brūhi’’.
Maggajino maggadesako ca, magge jīvati yo ca maggadūsī’’.
Magge jīvati me brūhi puṭṭho, atha me āvikarohi maggadūsiṃmaggadūsī’’ .
Lokassa sadevakassa netā, tādiṃ maggajinaṃ vadanti buddhā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paramaṃ paramanti yodha ñatvā, akkhāti vibhajate idheva dhammaṃ;
body.gatha2: Taṃ kaṅkhachidaṃ muniṃ anejaṃ, dutiyaṃ bhikkhunamāhu maggadesiṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo dhammapade sudesite, magge jīvati saññato satīmā;
body.gathalast: Māyāvī asaññato palāpo, patirūpena caraṃ sa maggadūsī.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete ca paṭivijjhi yo gahaṭṭho, sutavā ariyasāvako sapañño;
body.gatha2: Sabbe netādisātisabbe ne tādisātisabbe ne tādisātisabbe ne tādisāti ñatvā, iti disvā na hāpeti tassa saddhā;
body.gathalast: Kathaṃ hi duṭṭhena asampaduṭṭhaṃ, suddhaṃ asuddhena samaṃ kareyyā’’ti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Atha kho aññatarā devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
body.gathalast: Bhagavantaṃbhavantaṃbhavantaṃ puṭṭhumāgamma, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Dhammakāmo bhavaṃ hoti, dhammadessī parābhavo’’.
Dutiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Asantassa piyā honti, sante na kurute piyaṃ;
body.gathalast: Asataṃ dhammaṃ roceti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Tatiyaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Alaso kodhapaññāṇo, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Catutthaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo mātaraṃyo mātaraṃ vāyo mātaraṃ vāyo mātaraṃ vāyo mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā, jiṇṇakaṃ gatayobbanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Pahu santo na bharati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Pañcamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo brāhmaṇaṃyo brāhmaṇaṃ vāyo brāhmaṇaṃ vāyo brāhmaṇaṃ vāyo brāhmaṇaṃ vā samaṇaṃ vā, aññaṃ vāpi vanibbakaṃ;
body.gathalast: Musāvādena vañceti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Chaṭṭhamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Eko bhuñjati sādūni, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Sattamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Saññātiṃ atimaññeti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Aṭṭhamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vināseti, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Navamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Dussatidissatidissati paradāresu, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Dasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Tassā issā na supati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Ekādasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Issariyasmiṃ ṭhapetiṭhāpetiṭhāpetithapeti , taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Dvādasamaṃ bhagavā brūhi, kiṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
So ca rajjaṃ patthayati, taṃ parābhavato mukhaṃ’’.
Ariyo dassanasampanno, sa lokaṃ bhajate siva’’nti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme. Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Tena kho pana samayena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesane aggi pajjalito hoti āhuti paggahitā. Atha kho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ sapadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāno yena aggikabhāradvājassa brāhmaṇassa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami.
Addasā kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ. Disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘tatrevaatrevaatreva , muṇḍaka; tatreva, samaṇaka; tatreva, vasalaka tiṭṭhāhī’’ti.

Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā aggikabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘jānāsi pana tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, vasalaṃ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme’’ti? ‘‘Na khvāhaṃ, bho gotama, jānāmi vasalaṃ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme; sādhu me bhavaṃ gotamo tathā dhammaṃ desetu, yathāhaṃ jāneyyaṃ vasalaṃ vā vasalakaraṇe vā dhamme’’ti. ‘‘Tena hi, brāhmaṇa, suṇāhi, sādhukaṃ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī’’ti. ‘‘Evaṃ, bho’’ti kho aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavato paccassosi. Bhagavā etadavoca –
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kodhano upanāhī ca, pāpamakkhī ca yo naro;
body.gathalast: Vipannadiṭṭhi māyāvī, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ekajaṃ vā dvijaṃdijaṃ vāpi, yodha pāṇaṃ vihiṃsati;
body.gathalast: Yassa pāṇe dayā natthi, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Niggāhakonigghātako samaññāto, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Gāme vā yadi vā raññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Theyyā adinnamādetiadinnaṃ ādiyatiadinnaṃ ādiyati , taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Na hi te iṇamatthīti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Hantvā kiñcikkhamādeti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Attahetu parahetu, dhanahetu cadhanahetu va yo naro;
body.gathalast: Sakkhipuṭṭho musā brūti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Sāhasāsahasāsahasā sampiyena vā, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Pahu santo na bharati, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vā, bhātaraṃ bhaginiṃ sasuṃ;
body.gathalast: Hanti roseti vācāya, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Paṭicchannena manteti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo katvā pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, mā maṃ jaññāti icchati vibha. 894 passitabbaṃ;
body.gathalast: Yo paṭicchannakammanto, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo ve parakulaṃ gantvā, bhutvāna sutvā ca (syā. ka.) sucibhojanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Āgataṃ nappaṭipūjeti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo brāhmaṇaṃ samaṇaṃ vā, aññaṃ vāpi vanibbakaṃ;
body.gathalast: Musāvādena vañceti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Roseti vācā na ca deti, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Kiñcikkhaṃ nijigīsānonijigiṃsānonijigiṃsānonijigiṃsānonijigiṃsāno , taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Nihīno sena mānena, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Ahiriko anottappī, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo buddhaṃ paribhāsati, atha vā tassa sāvakaṃ;
body.gathalast: Paribbājaṃparibbajaṃparibbājakaṃparibbājakaṃ gahaṭṭhaṃ vā, taṃ jaññā vasalo iti.
Coro sabrahmake loke, eso kho vasalādhamo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete kho vasalā vuttā, mayā yete pakāsitā;
body.gatha2: Na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
body.gathalast: Kammunākammanākammanā vasalo hoti, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo.
Caṇḍālaputto sopākosapāko , mātaṅgo iti vissuto.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So yasaṃ paramaṃ pattoso yasapparamappattoso yasapparamappatto , mātaṅgo yaṃ sudullabhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Āgacchuṃ tassupaṭṭhānaṃ, khattiyā brāhmaṇā bahū.
Na naṃ jāti nivāresi, brahmalokūpapattiyā.
Te ca pāpesu kammesu, abhiṇhamupadissare.
Na ne jāti nivāreti, duggatyāduggaccāduggaccāduggaccāduggaccā garahāya vā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na jaccā vasalo hoti, na jaccā hoti brāhmaṇo;
body.gathalast: Kammunā vasalo hoti, kammunā hoti brāhmaṇo’’ti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ vutte, aggikabhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘abhikkantaṃ, bho gotama…pe… upāsakaṃ maṃ bhavaṃ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gata’’nti.
body.gathalast: Sakko ujū ca suhujūsūjū ca, sūvaco cassa mudu anatimānī.
body.gatha1: Santussako ca subharo ca, appakicco ca sallahukavutti;
body.gathalast: Santindriyo ca nipako ca, appagabbho kulesvananugiddho.
body.gatha1: Na ca khuddamācare kiñci, yena viññū pare upavadeyyuṃ;
body.gathalast: Sukhino va khemino hontu, sabbasattāsabbe sattāsabbe sattā bhavantu sukhitattā.
body.gatha1: Ye keci pāṇabhūtatthi, tasā vā thāvarā vanavasesā;
body.gathalast: Dīghā vā ye va mahantāmahanta , majjhimā rassakā aṇukathūlā.
body.gatha1: Diṭṭhā vā ye va adiṭṭhāadiṭṭha , ye vaye caye caye caye ca dūre vasanti avidūre;
body.gathalast: Bhūtā va sambhavesī vabhūtā vā sambhavesī vābhūtā vā sambhavesī vābhūtā vā sambhavesī vābhūtā vā sambhavesī vā , sabbasattā bhavantu sukhitattā.
body.gatha1: Na paro paraṃ nikubbetha, nātimaññetha katthaci na kañcinaṃ kañcinaṃ kañcinaṃ kiñcina kiñci ;
body.gathalast: Byārosanā paṭighasaññā, nāññamaññassa dukkhamiccheyya.
Evampi sabbabhūtesu, mānasaṃ bhāvaye aparimāṇaṃ.
Uddhaṃ adho ca tiriyañca, asambādhaṃ averamasapattaṃ.
body.gatha1: Tiṭṭhaṃ caraṃ nisinno vavāvāvāvā , sayāno yāvatāssa vitamiddho vigatamiddo (bahūsu);
body.gathalast: Etaṃ satiṃ adhiṭṭheyya, brahmametaṃ vihāramidhamāhu.
Kāmesu vinayavineyyavineyyavineyya gedhaṃ, na hi jātuggabbhaseyya punaretīti.
Anomanāmaṃ satthāraṃ, handa passāma gotamaṃ’’.
Kacci iṭṭhe aniṭṭhe ca, saṅkappassa vasīkatā’’.
Atho iṭṭhe aniṭṭhe ca, saṅkappassa vasīkatā’’.
Kacci ārā pamādamhā, kacci jhānaṃ na riñcati’’.
Atho ārā pamādamhā, buddho jhānaṃ na riñcati’’.
Kacci vebhūtiyaṃ nāha, kacci samphaṃ na bhāsati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Musā ca so na bhaṇati, (iti sātāgiro yakkho)
body.gathalast: Atho vebhūtiyaṃ nāha, mantā atthaṃ ca atthaṃ so (sī. pī. ka.) bhāsati’’.
Kacci mohaṃ atikkanto, kacci dhammesu cakkhumā’’.
Sabbamohaṃ atikkanto, buddho dhammesu cakkhumā’’.
Kaccissa āsavā khīṇā, kacci natthi punabbhavo’’.
Sabbassa āsavā khīṇā, natthi tassa punabbhavo’’.
Vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, dhammato naṃ pasaṃsati’’.
Vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, dhammato anumodasi’’.
Vijjācaraṇasampannaṃ, handa passāma gotamaṃ.
Muniṃ vanasmiṃ jhāyantaṃ, ehi passāma gotamaṃ.
Upasaṅkamma pucchāma, maccupāsappamocanaṃ.
Buddhaṃ verabhayātītaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ’’.
Kissa loko upādāya, kismiṃ loko vihaññati’’.
Channameva upādāya, chasu loko vihaññati’’.
Niyyānaṃ pucchito brūhi, kathaṃ dukkhā pamuccatipamuñcati’’ .
Ettha chandaṃ virājetvā, evaṃ dukkhā pamuccati.
Etaṃ vo ahamakkhāmi, evaṃ dukkhā pamuccati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ko sūdha tarati oghaṃ, kodha tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
body.gathalast: Appatiṭṭhe anālambe, ko gambhīre na sīdati’’.
Ajjhattacintīajjhattasaññīajjhattasaññīajjhattasaññī satimā, oghaṃ tarati duttaraṃ.
Nandībhavaparikkhīṇo, so gambhīre na sīdati’’.
Taṃ passatha sabbadhi vippamuttaṃ, dibbe pathe kamamānaṃ mahesiṃ.
Taṃ passatha sabbaviduṃ sumedhaṃ, ariye pathe kamamānaṃ mahesiṃ.
Yaṃ addasāma sambuddhaṃ, oghatiṇṇamanāsavaṃ.
Sabbe taṃ saraṇaṃ yanti, tvaṃ no satthā anuttaro.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Te mayaṃ vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ;
body.gathalast: Namassamānā sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammata’’nti.
body.paragraph: Evaṃ me sutaṃ – ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane. Atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘nikkhama, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā nikkhami. ‘‘Pavisa, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā pāvisi.
Dutiyampi kho…pe… tatiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘nikkhama, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā nikkhami. ‘‘Pavisa, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Sādhāvuso’’ti bhagavā pāvisi.
Catutthampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ‘‘nikkhama, samaṇā’’ti. ‘‘Na khvāhaṃ taṃ , āvuso, nikkhamissāmi. Yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohī’’ti.
‘‘Pañhaṃ taṃ, samaṇa, pucchissāmi. Sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmī’’ti.

‘‘Na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso, passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya. Api ca tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha yadākaṅkhasī’’ti. Atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ sūdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ su suciṇṇaṃ sukhamāvahāti;
body.gathalast: Kiṃ sukiṃ sū have sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ, kathaṃ jīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
body.gathalast: Saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ, paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ su tarati oghaṃ, kathaṃ su tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kathaṃ su dukkhamacceti, kathaṃ su parisujjhati’’.
Vīriyenaviriyenaviriyenaviriyenaviriyena dukkhamacceti, paññāya parisujjhati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ su labhate paññaṃ, kathaṃ su vindate dhanaṃ;
body.gatha2: Kathaṃ su kittiṃ pappoti, kathaṃ mittāni ganthati;
body.gathalast: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socati’’.
Sussūsaṃsussūsāsussūsā labhate paññaṃ, appamatto vicakkhaṇo.
Saccena kittiṃ pappoti, dadaṃ mittāni ganthati.
Saccaṃ dhammodamo dhiti cāgo, sa ve pecca na socati.
Yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyodha vijjati’’.
Yohaṃsohaṃsohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yo attho samparāyiko.
Yohaṃ aṭṭhinhārūhi saṃyutto (syā. ka.) ajja pajānāmi, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
body.gathalast: Namassamāno sambuddhaṃ, dhammassa ca sudhammata’’nti.
body.gatha1: Caraṃ vā yadi vā tiṭṭhaṃ, nisinno uda vā sayaṃ;
body.gathalast: Samiñjeti pasāreti, esā kāyassa iñjanā.
Chaviyā kāyo paṭicchanno, yathābhūtaṃ na dissati.
Hadayassa papphāsassa, vakkassa pihakassa ca.
body.gatha1: Siṅghāṇikāya kheḷassa, sedassa ca medassa ca;
body.gathalast: Lohitassa lasikāya, pittassa ca vasāya ca.
body.gatha1: Athassa navahi sotehi, asucī savati sabbadā;
body.gathalast: Akkhimhā akkhigūthako, kaṇṇamhā kaṇṇagūthako.
Pittaṃ semhañca vamati, kāyamhā sedajallikā.
Subhato naṃ maññati, bālo avijjāya purakkhato.
body.gatha1: Yadā ca so mato seti, uddhumāto vinīlako;
body.gathalast: Apaviddho susānasmiṃ, anapekkhā honti ñātayo.
body.gatha1: Khādanti naṃ suvānāsupāṇā ca, siṅgālāsigālāsigālāsigālāsigālā vakā kimī;
body.gathalast: Kākā gijjhā ca khādanti, ye caññe santi pāṇino.
So kho naṃ parijānāti, yathābhūtañhi passati.
body.gatha1: Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, kāye chandaṃ virājaye.
Ajjhagā amataṃ santiṃ, nibbānaṃ padamaccutaṃ.
Nānākuṇapaparipūro, vissavanto tato tato.
Paraṃ vā avajāneyya, kimaññatra adassanāti.
body.gatha1: Santhavātosandhavato bhayaṃ jātaṃ, niketā jāyate rajo;
body.gathalast: Aniketamasanthavaṃ, etaṃ ve munidassanaṃ.
body.gatha1: Yo jātamucchijja na ropayeyya, jāyantamassa nānuppavecche;
body.gathalast: Tamāhu ekaṃ muninaṃ carantaṃ, addakkhi so santipadaṃ mahesi.
body.gatha1: Saṅkhāya vatthūni pamāyapahāyapahāyapahāyasamāya bījaṃ, sinehamassa nānuppavecche;
body.gathalast: Sa ve munī jātikhayantadassī, takkaṃ pahāya na upeti saṅkhaṃ.
body.gatha1: Aññāya sabbāni nivesanāni, anikāmayaṃ aññatarampi tesaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sa ve munī vītagedho agiddho, nāyūhatī pāragato hi hoti.
body.gatha1: Sabbābhibhuṃ sabbaviduṃ sumedhaṃ, sabbesu dhammesu anūpalittaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sabbañjahaṃ taṇhakkhaye vimuttaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā munimuniṃmuniṃ vedayanti.
Saṅgā pamuttaṃ akhilaṃ anāsavaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha2: Sīhaṃva saddesu asantasantaṃ, vātaṃva jālamhi asajjamānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Yo ogahaṇe thambhorivābhijāyati, yasmiṃ pare vācāpariyantaṃvācaṃ pariyantaṃ vadanti;
body.gathalast: Taṃ vītarāgaṃ susamāhitindriyaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Yo ve ṭhitatto tasaraṃva ujju, jigucchati kammehi pāpakehi;
body.gathalast: Vīmaṃsamāno visamaṃ samañca, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Yo saññatatto na karoti pāpaṃ, daharo majjhimo ca munidaharo ca majjho ca munīdaharo ca majjho ca munīdaharo ca majjho ca munīdaharo ca majjho ca munī yatatto;
body.gathalast: Arosaneyyo na so roseti kañci na roseti (syā.), taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Yadaggato majjhato sesato vā, piṇḍaṃ labhetha paradattūpajīvī;
body.gathalast: Nālaṃ thutuṃ nopi nipaccavādī, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Muniṃ carantaṃ virataṃ methunasmā, yo yobbane nopanibajjhate kvaci;
body.gathalast: Madappamādā virataṃ vippamuttaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Aññāya lokaṃ paramatthadassiṃ, oghaṃ samuddaṃ atitariya tādiṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ chinnaganthaṃ asitaṃ anāsavaṃ, taṃ vāpi dhīrā muni vedayanti.
body.gatha1: Asamā ubho dūravihāravuttino, gihīgihi dāraposī amamo ca subbato;
body.gathalast: Parapāṇarodhāya gihī asaññato, niccaṃ munī rakkhati pāṇinepāṇino yato.
body.gatha1: Sikhī yathā nīlagīvonīlagivo vihaṅgamo, haṃsassa nopeti javaṃ kudācanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Evaṃ gihī nānukaroti bhikkhuno, munino vivittassa vanamhi jhāyatoti.
body.paragraph: Tassuddānaṃ –
body.gatha1: Urago dhaniyo ceva, visāṇañca tathā kasi;
body.gathalast: Cundo parābhavo ceva, vasalo mettabhāvanā.
body.gatha1: Sātāgiro āḷavako, vijayo ca tathā muni;
body.gathalast: Dvādasetāni suttāni, uragavaggoti vuccatīti.
